title: Tri-Slosher ASH-N
paragraphs: The Tri-Slosher ASH-N is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is a Barazushi-branded variant of the the Tri-Slosher from the Splatlands Collection and features a different sub and special weapon.

The Tri-Slosher ASH-N is similar to the Tri-Slosher with the main difference being the bucket is now a dark gray instead of blue. The handle is now a dark brown and a packet resembling a field ration packet stamped with Barazushi's logo is attached to the right side.
The Tri-Slosher ASH-N makes its first appearance in Splatoon 3 with identical stats to the Tri-Slosher. It comes with Splat Bomb and Splattercolor Screen.
- Promotional image of the Splatlands Collection - Barazushi weapons

The brand stylization "ASH-N" could be interpreted as ashen, regarding the weapon's coloration, or ashing.
